text:
The location shown on the screen is the Tokyo Santa School.
However, there's something different about this place that everyone should know...

name: A Snow White Wolf Maiden?
text:
Ah, Brother Jack, you are on camera!
Come on now, don't be shy, come over here!

name: A Snow Fairy?
text:
…I don't need to be there.
You're the one who wanted to start filming, aren't you?

name: A Snow Fairy?
text:
Besides, I'm so big that I can't even
fit in the same frame as you, you know?

name: A Snow White Wolf Maiden?
text:
Geez, why are you always so mean!?
Just come over here, I want to be in the picture with you!

name: A Snow White Wolf Maiden?
text:
Come on, if you keep being lazy,
you'll end up looking like that snowman!

name: A Snow Fairy?
text:
Oi! Don't pull me!
…Geez, is this good enough?

name: A Snow White Wolf Maiden?
text:
Ehehe, alright, here we go!
[Player]-san, everyone... can you see us?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm Snegurochka!
...Well, I think you already know that.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm Jack Frost.
…Geez, why do I have to do this?

On the screen that everyone was watching,
the girl who called herself Snegurochka smiled gently.

Prologue:
Make-up Snow Maiden!

It was the time when the world was filled with anticipation for Christmas,
in other words, the busiest time for Santas.

Ded, the principal of Santa School,
was also busy with a mountain of paperwork piled on his desk.

name: Ded
text:
Hmm, next is... a request from a department store
to help with their customer attraction event, is it?

During this season, the Santas' job was no longer
just to deliver dreams and hopes to children.

name: Ded
text:
Hmm... it's a bit tough given the season,
but maybe I can manage if I reschedule?

name: Yule
text:
Uhh, Ded-senpai?
May I have a moment of your time?

name: Krampus
text:
Um, on a different matter, I also had
something I wanted to ask you, Principal.

name: Ded
text:
Woah!? When did you two get in here?
Looks like you've really improved your sneaking skills.
Surprised, Ded, the principal of Santa School, praised his students for their improved stealth skills, one of the great principles of Santas.

name: Krampus
text:
No, I'm sorry, I did knock, but
you seemed very focused and didn't notice...

Yule and Krampus glanced at the mountains of documents piled high on the desk,
and their expressions turned uneasy.

name: Yule
text:
Principal... have you taken any breaks?
You don't look so good.

name: Ded
text:
Haha, I've just been really busy lately.
It's a very happy thing, so I have to work a bit harder.

name: Ded
text:
It's alright, don't worry, I'll rest once this is done today.
Otherwise, I'd really become a "black" Santa, wouldn't I?
Even one of the piles of documents he pointed to seemed unlikely to be finished by the end of the day to Yule's eyes.

name: Krampus
text:
You can joke all you want, but you won't fool me.
You can't tell children to go to bed early and be good if you're not doing it yourself.

name: Ded
text:
Hey, hey, hey, Krampus, you've gotten pretty high and mighty, haven't you?
That's quite a mouth on you, talking to me like that, isn't it?

name: Krampus
text:
Gah, but I'm not saying anything wrong.
At least, you should ask for help from others...!

name: Ded
text:
Now, now, my other self.
You shouldn't threaten our students who are worried about us.

name: Ded
text:
However, it's not just me who's busy.
Professor Tanngrisnir is also busy with the reindeer department, and so on...

name: Yule
text:
Then... how about Tomte?
He's so helpful, I'm sure he'd be able to assist!

name: Ded
text:
Tomte tends to take on a lot of work from various people, just like me.
I don't want to burden him too much, but...

name: Ded
text:
…Oh, speaking of which, why are you two here?
Did you have some business with me?

name: Krampus
text:
Yule, you were here first, so you go ahead.
Weren't you in a hurry about something?

name: Yule
text:
That's right, I almost forgot the main topic.
Actually, we have a visitor waiting.
After a knock, the door to the principal's office opened, and a young white wolf girl in a school uniform entered the room.

name: Snegurochka
text:
…Ehehe.
Long time no see, Grandpa Ded!

name: Ded
text:
S-Snegurochka!?
Is that really you, Snegurochka...!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes! Magical Girl Snegurochka is here to help
my busy and struggling grandpa!

name: Krampus
text:
Eh... Whoaaaaaa! It's not fan cosplay,
it's the real thing, the real Magical Girl Snegurochka is right before my eyes!?

name: Yule
text:
Oh, is she an acquaintance of yours, Krampus-senpai?
Such a small child... could it be a Santa-related matter?

name: Yule
text:
…Huh, speaking of which, 'Grandpa'?
Principal, you have a grandchild!?

With the appearance of the girl calling herself Snegurochka,
the principal's office descended into chaos, each person expressing their own surprise.

name: Krampus
text:
Please sign this! To Krampus-san!
I'm cheering for this season's show!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, here you go, Krampus-san.
I'm so happy, to think I'd have a fan at Santa School.
Saying so, Snegurochka handed Krampus an autograph board.

name: Ded
text:
Um, Magical Girl, you say?
Krampus, do you know Snegurochka?

name: Krampus
text:
Ded-sensei, you don't know!?
Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka is the hottest tokusatsu show this winter!

name: Krampus
text:
It's the latest series of the long-running Tokyo Magical Girl shows,
and this season's theme is 'Snow', featuring a super rookie child actor!

name: Krampus
text:
As the title suggests, the protagonist of the show is this Magical Girl,
Snegurochka-chan! She's a huge hit, just like the original character!

name: Krampus
text:
Rumor has it that the theme of this season was suddenly changed to 'Snow'
because they discovered this child actor!

name: Krampus
text:
The highly popular group's theme song is also famous for its perfection,
and its meticulously crafted melody will remain in tokusatsu history forever --

name: Ded
text:
I see, I see.
I'm not very familiar with youth culture, so I didn't know.

name: Yule
text:
More importantly, you just said 'Grandpa'...!
Principal, you have a grandchild!?

name: Ded
text:
Strictly speaking, it's different, Yule.
This child is my alter ego, Snegurochka.

In his homeland, the alternate world Kitezh,
there is a 'faith' in Ded Moroz's granddaughter.

Snegurochka, the snow maiden spirit. A type of familiar that powerful snow fairies
can create by splitting off from their own existence.
So, to be precise, there are multiple races called Snegurochka, however--

name: Ded
text:
This girl is the only Snegurochka I have created from snow
since I formed a 'bond' with Santa.

name: Ded
text:
And 'as long as she is Snegurochka',
according to tradition, she becomes my granddaughter.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes! And so, I've come to
your place, Grandpa Ded!
Saying so, Snegurochka handed him a transfer application from Nakano Entertainment Academy.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'll be in your care for a while!
No, let me take care of a lot of things for you, Grandpa?

Afterward, in the principal's office from which Yule and the others had left,
Snegurochka began tidying up the somewhat messy room.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hum hum hum~♪
Grandpa, do you want coffee or cocoa?

name: Ded
text:
Could you get me cocoa then?
Not too hot, please.

name: Ded
text:
But Snegurochka,
are you really here to help me?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, I really am. Grandpa, didn't you breathe life into me
to become a being to support hard-working Santas?

name: Ded
text:
Haha, well, yes, that's true. But to me, you're still a child,
so I'd like you to play more or something--

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez, stop treating me like a child!
I want to help you, Grandpa!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I heard that you were having a tough time,
so I couldn't just sit still!

Ded watched Snegurochka, who was too mature for her age, cleaning,
feeling both proud and a little sad.

name: Ded
text:
Then, is there anything you want?
It's a bit early for Christmas, but it is a reunion, so feel free to ask for anything.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Oh, Grandpa, it's fine...
Ah, that's right! Then, I'd like a tour of the school!

name: Snegurochka
text:
But you seem to be busy too...
And the other students must be busy as well, right?

name: Ded
text:
Hmm, that's true.
...No, I just thought of the perfect person. Wait a moment.

After he said that, after a while,
a large polar bear beastman appeared in the principal's office.

name: Jack Frost
text:
…Haaah, getting called to the principal's office.
I'm sure haven't caused any trouble, though.

The huge, exaggerated sigh of the large man who appeared
drew frosty art on the principal's office window.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Or, is it a request for "graffiti"?
Then, I'll gladly paint over this black-and-white principal's office with my colors.

name: Ded
text:
Ah, no, actually, Jack Frost,
I have something I'd like to ask of you, as a student.

name: Ded
text:
Here, this is your senior.
Give him a proper greeting, Snegurochka.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hello, Brother Jack!
I'm Snegurochka, Grandpa Ded's granddaughter!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Brother...? Wait, Ded-sensei.
I didn't know you had a granddaughter!?

name: Ded
text:
Hold on, hold on, we just went through that.
Snegurochka, stop saying misleading things.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Amazing! It's so cool around Brother, it feels great~
Thank you, Grandpa, you were thoughtful of me!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh, what's up with you, kid!
Don't cling to me, I'm not responsible if you get frostbite!

name: Ded
text:
Hahahaha, don't worry. Snegurochka is a snow fairy just like me.
As I expected, you two seem to get along well.

name: Ded
text:
This child, she's an actress herself.
I'm sure you'll find common ground, being in entertainment yourselves.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Don't lump my street graffiti with
those stage performers, old man!?

name: Ded
text:
So, Jack, I'm sorry, but would you mind giving Snegurochka
a tour of the school in my place?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Huh!? No, no, no...
Why me? There are plenty of other people, aren't there!?

name: Ded
text:
No, no, there's no one more suitable than you.
There aren't many people who are as "good with children" as you, are there?

With an unusually emphasized tone and a slightly meaningful expression,
Ded smiled.

name: Ded
text:
And you, you punk,
you skipped class again, didn't you?

name: Ded
text:
'White' is covering for you,
but I've already lost my patience, you know?

name: Ded
text:
I've been dealing with your nonsense enough.
You can't even do this one favor for me?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Shut up, you old geezer.
I'm making up for the missed classes outside of school, aren't I?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Besides, I didn't ask for this.
If you don't like it, just expel me or whatever.

name: Ded
text:
Hah, this brat, he's got guts...!
Alright, I'll put a bullet in that attitude of yours.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wait, no--!!
Don't mess up the room, I just cleaned it!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm sorry, it's my fault for being selfish.
Thank you, Grandpa, I can look around by myself!
Saying so, Snegurochka left the principal's office, telling Ded she would be back later.

name: Ded
text:
…That child, despite looking young, is too mature and too obedient.
Because that's how I created her.

name: Ded
text:
I just reunited with her, but judging from her demeanor,
I'm sure she's spent her time in Tokyo without knowing what it's like to play.

name: Ded
text:
That's why Jack, you're the right person for this.
Would you mind taking care of her?

name: Jack Frost
text:
…Tch, fine.
In exchange, my graduation credits for academic studies--

name: Ded
text: I can't allow that, you must attend your classes properly.

As Jack Frost left the principal's office with a displeased look,
Snegurochka was waiting, sitting on the nearby floor.

name: Snegurochka
text:
…I'm sorry, it's my fault that
you and Grandpa fought.

name: Jack Frost
text:
It's not your fault.
It's always been like this with Ded-sensei, a constant back and forth.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Really?
You don't hate Grandpa, do you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Of course I wouldn't hate him for something like that.
If anything, I've caused him a lot of trouble, so--

name: Jack Frost
text:
Someone like me, a dropout, he should just abandon me.
…Come on, you wanted a tour, didn't you?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Huh? No, it's fine, don't worry about it.
It must have been a nuisance to be forced to do it, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Geez, you're a troublesome kid.
I said I'd give you a tour, so come on, let's go.

As Jack played with his hands, which were radiating a cool aura,
Snegurochka happily took his hand.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, thank you, Brother Jack!
Nice to meet you, you can call me Goo-chan!

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm definitely not calling you that,
and first, stop calling me 'Brother'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Eh, why?
Do you perhaps not like being called 'Brother'...?

name: Jack Frost
text:
No, it's not that I dislike it, but...
it just makes me feel itchy!!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Then... Jack-kun, Jack-chan?
Hmm... I guess 'Brother' fits best after all. ...Is that not okay?

name: Jack Frost
text: …Geez, you're not going to listen no matter what I say.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Then, thank you for the school tour!
I'm looking forward to it, I wonder what Grandpa's school is like.

With a cheerful Snegurochka and a somewhat overwhelmed Jack Frost,
the two began their school exploration.

As they went around the main classrooms like the classrooms, grounds, and cafeteria,
Snegurochka suddenly called out to Jack.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, Brother.
Why do people keep moving away from us...?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Could it be, Brother...
You don't have any friends at school?
At Snegurochka's pointed question, Jack choked on his own words.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You...! You shouldn't say such delicate things
directly to someone, even if you're thinking them!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Eh, I'm sorry.
I thought you didn't really care, Brother...

name: Jack Frost
text:
…Santa School, naturally, has many good kids.
Someone who skips class like me is an anomaly.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Naturally, no one would want to get close
to someone like that.

name: Jack Frost
text:
（…Alright, to make friends, the first steps are crucial.
I-I'm going to be brave and make friends!）

Jack's eyes burned with determination as he
looked around for someone he could talk to.

name: Jack Frost
text:
（U-Unbelievable...!?
Groups have already formed everywhere except for me!?）

name: Jack Frost
text:
（It's over... Freshman year start dash failed,
farewell, my fun school life...）

name: Snegurochka
text:
…So the reason why you started skipping school was because it wasn't fun?
There must have been at least one person who would talk to you, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Of course there was.
I even tried to talk to them myself a few times, but--

name: Female Student
text:
…I feel a chill.
Did I catch a cold?

The student's friend, who hadn't noticed Jack nearby,
awkwardly poked her to let her know.

name: Female Student
text:
Ah... Ahahahahaha, good morning, Jack-kun!
It's okay, I'm really alright!

name: Female Student
text:
Geez~ I told you to wear warmer tights
this season, didn't I~?

name: Jack Frost
text: Haha, hahahaha...

name: Jack Frost
text:
My surroundings are covered in winter's cold, whether it's spring or summer.
Even if snow fairies like you like it, others don't.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Because there are many good people, I ended up causing them trouble,
and some even genuinely felt sick.
Snegurochka hugged Jack tightly as he spoke calmly about what had passed.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's okay, I'll be here for a while.
Ehehe, Brother Jack and I, we'll be each other's first friends at this school.

name: Jack Frost
text:
…I'm not happy about it.
A kid like you, as my friend.

name: Snegurochka
text:
There you go again, saying things like that~.
I'll ask Grandpa to put us in the same class later!

name: Snegurochka
text:
So let's take classes together!
Right? Is that okay?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You, that's impossible. You were in middle school at your previous academy, weren't you?
Well, even that, to be honest, I think you're overreaching quite a bit.

name: Jack Frost
text:
At Santa School, they judge based on the ability of each department,
but in my estimation, you're upper elementary school, or even younger?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Let me tell you, Brother, you're only saying that
because you don't know my abilities as a Santa, alright!?

Saying that, Snegurochka activated an app.
Then, she took out something small in her hand.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother, who do you think my Grandpa is?
My Santa power is inherited from Grandpa!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Here we go, Roo-chan!
GO! Make-uo Snow Maiden!!

She opened something like a compact mirror, and when she lightly traced
the powder part with her hand cotton-like snow began to overflow from it.

As the magical snow covered Snegurochka's body,
it gradually transformed into a costume--

name: Snegurochka
text:
Magical Girl Snegurochka is here!
Now, tell me your wish!

In Snegurochka's hand, after her "transformation",
was a 'magic wand' that matched her attire.

As she swung her wand widely, a vibrant rainbow was drawn in mid-air,
and Snegurochka struck a perfect pose.

On top of that rainbow, the snow reindeer, called Roo-chan, who was on her shoulder,
transformed into an adult reindeer and galloped away.

Apparently, Snegurochka, like her grandfather,
can "create those things from her own body".
Jack Frost simply watched the scene without reacting.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey~!
You could at least say 'Oh~!' or something!

name: Jack Frost
text:
No, it's not that I wasn't surprised.
Rather, I was too surprised to speak...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, really~?
Then you should have said so earlier!

name: Jack Frost
text:
（To be able to serve as both Santa and a reindeer buddy alone,
that's just straight up cheating, but--）

Jack Frost instinctively sensed, along with his surprise.
That small body was too overpowered, and that meant--

After midnight, when the presence of people disappeared from the town.
Jack Frost was doing something, not just standing there, alone.

name: Ded
text:
As always, your formless works are wonderful.
A new generation of Santa Claus, an unknown street artist.

name: Ded
text:
This work also, among connoisseurs, is bid on at exorbitant prices,
and part of the auction proceeds are donated to orphanages and charities.

name: Ded
text:
It results in--
an indirect gift from you.

name: Ded
text:
If you revealed your identity, your skills would be widely appreciated.
Your artistry and actions would surely be praised as wonderful.

name: Jack Frost
text:
…I'm not doing it for honor or anything like that.
My graffiti is like an instinct of my kind as Jack Frosts.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I leave the proof of my existence on grass and windows.
It's just an extension of that, and not some grand art...

The paint sprayed from the can froze in front of Jack Frost,
completing his unique graffiti art.

At tonight's temperature, it would surely remain until morning,
and as Ded said, it would benefit the children.

name: Jack Frost
text:
…You know it's impossible to reveal my identity, don't you?
Even if I'm praised now, unauthorized graffiti is a crime.

name: Ded
text:
That's precisely why, Jack.
If you came out, wouldn't you have more freedom to act?

name: Ded
text:
I think you're a bit too secretive.
About the graffiti, and also about the other--

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ded-sensei, you're busy, aren't you?
Did you really come all this way just to say that?
Principal Ded Moroz smiled wryly at Jack Frost, who wouldn't listen.

name: Ded
text:
Even if your initial steps were wrong,
you can still be recognized and appreciated later, just as I was.

name: Jack Frost
text:
…Ded-sensei?
You don't have to lie to console me.

Ded-sensei began to talk about his own Santa roots.
A confession of the sin he had committed: the usurpation of the 'role' of Santa--

name: Ded
text:
I... My current power
was obtained at a great cost.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Are you sure you should be saying that? Wouldn't this be a huge scandal?
If it got out...

Ded didn't say anything, but his gentle expression
eloquently showed the answer more than words ever could.

name: Jack Frost
text:
（Snegurochka,
just how much of that power--）

name: Snegurochka
text:
What's wrong, Brother Jack...?
Ah, I bet you were captivated by my transformation outfit, weren't you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Of course not.
I was just thinking a little.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, hey, I was wondering, Brother Jack,
what do you do when you skip school?

name: Jack Frost
text:
…I'll tell you sometime.
If you skip with me, that is.

name: Snegurochka
text:
…No, my magic isn't working?
I... there's really nothing I can do anymore...

name: Boogeyman
text:
Boogie woogie woogie woogie!
The human heart accepts fear more heavily than love.

name: Boogeyman
text:
Those who couldn't endure evolution disappeared.
Life cannot escape fear because it tries to avoid death.

name: Boogeyman
text:
As proof, heavy memories of "trauma" linger forever,
but love, as light as snow, gradually fades away, doesn't it?

name: Boogeyman
text:
Now, Magical Girl Snegurochka.
Despair, and you shall be mine--!

name: Snegurochka
text:
（Does love really get painted over by fear...?
That's so painful... and sad.）

In Snegurochka's heart, the faces of her beloved friends from the same school
flashed like a revolving lantern.

At that moment, Snegurochka's transformation compact at her chest
began to emit a strong light.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, no, that's wrong!
Love isn't measured only by weight and lightness.

name: Boogeyman
text:
--Strong! Ugh, my fear is being pushed back.
Don't you feel that fear is heavy!?

name: Boogeyman
text:
What if the other person hated you?
What if you confessed and were rejected...!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Love is not the enemy of fear!
Even snow... it's not just light, and it's not just cold.

The Magical Girl raised her wand and began to chant.
Rainbow auroras gathered around the wand like ribbons.

When the Magical Girl swung it down,
the Great Demon King of Fear was swallowed by the rainbow light.

name: Boogeyman
text:
Kuh, Kuhahahaha!!
I will return again, as long as human fear never ceases, forever!

name: Snegurochka
text:
…Demon King, the Backstage Mastermind,
I too want to "decorate snow" (make up) with you someday.

Snegurochka, who defeated the Great Demon King of Fear with the power of love,
but her beloved senior has fallen into the enemy's clutches...!?

Next time, Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka!
Senpai, wait for me! Thrilling ☆ Fluffy ☆ Panic!!

name: Zhurong
text:
Wow~ Boogeyman-sensei, your presence is amazing!
My heart was pounding even through the screen.

name: Boogeyman
text:
Hehe, thank you.
Being praised so much makes me a little shy.

name: Quantum
text:
So "that theater group in Yurakucho" (Entertainers) is even involved in the video industry.
Children's shows nowadays are really putting in effort, aren't they?

name: Zhurong
text:
Hey~ hey~ let's play make-believe!
Teacher, you're the Magical Girl!

name: Boogeyman
text:
You really mean that!?
Even though I'm here as the actual character!?

name: Zhurong
text:
Gwah-hah-hah-hah-hah!
Sink into the depths of terror--!!

name: Quantum
text:
Oh well~ Zhurong. I guess I'll help you.
Right, Teacher, can you be the Magical Girl?

The day after the broadcast, Snegurochka pleaded with the principal and
attended class in the same classroom as Jack Frost.

name: Male Student
text:
Snegurochka-chan, I saw yesterday's broadcast~!
It was the best, you were so cute, I can't wait for next week!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, thank you very much. It's going to get even more
interesting from now on, so please look forward to it!

name: Therian Student
text:
Hey, hey, Snegurochka-chan, you came from "Nakano Academy", right?
Did you transfer because Ded-sensei is here?

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, that's a part of it, but I also came to grant
the wishes of all the Santas during this busy time!

name: Snegurochka
text:
So if you have any troubles or things you need help with,
please tell Magical Girl Snegurochka!

name: Male Student
text:
Waaah~ If Snegurochka-chan tells me to do my best,
I feel like I can do my best endlessly~!!

Snegurochka, who had completely become the class's favorite,
suddenly noticed that Jack was not in the classroom.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Huh... Does anyone know where Brother Jack is?
Is he in the restroom?

name: Therian Student
text:
Brother...? Um, I don't think he'll be coming today.
He pretty much only attends specific classes.

Snegurochka showed no sign of noticing the commotion around
her from her sudden 'Brother' comment, and seemed to be deep in thought.

name: Therian Student
text:
Hey, hey, it's almost the Santa Departure Ceremony, but
Snegurochka-chan, do you have anything you want to do?

name: Therian Student
text:
One of the great principles of Santa is 'idea'.
We're from the upper grades, so we have to come up with some ideas from our class too.

name: Snegurochka
text:
…I'm sorry, I'm going to go look for Brother Jack!
Good grief, he promised to come to class with me.

name: Male Student
text:
Eh!? Snegurochka-chan!?
Class is about to start~!

As Snegurochka ran off somewhere,
the surroundings grew even noisier.

name: Male Student
text:
They seem quite close,
is Jack-kun really her brother!?

name: Therian Student
text:
Wait, wait, the principal is her grandpa... and,
huh, my head's getting all messed up!?

Snegurochka, who had run out of the classroom,
found Jack Frost about to leave the school gate.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez, Brother Jack!
You promised to come to class with me!

name: Jack Frost
text:
I don't remember making any such promise.
You'd better hurry back or you'll be late for class.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's my line!
You're trying to skip class and go play, aren't you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's right, I'm Santa School's number one unorthodox (BAD BOY) student.
If you hang out with me, you'll end up dropping out too.

name: Snegurochka
text:
…Come on, don't say stuff like that.
Come on, let's go to class together!

Having said that, Snegurochka and tried to pull
Jack Frost's large body along.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You...! You're so strong!?
Wait, wait, wait, I'm not going!

name: Snegurochka
text:
…Geez!
Brother, if you're going to be like that, I have a plan too, you know!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
If you won't go back to class,
I'll follow you and become a delinquent too! Is that okay!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
"Is that okay...?" You, what kind of threat is that?
Of course it's not okay. You're a good kid, so go back to class.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, no, no~ Brother Jack, unless you come with me, I'm not going~!
Otherwise, this Snegurochka will follow you!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Annoying...
This is why I hate kids.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Alright, alright, I give up.
I'll go after I change, so you go on ahead.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yay!
Thank you, Brother, I'll be waiting, okay?

Jack Frost watched Snegurochka skip cheerfully back to the classroom,
with an exasperated look on his face.

And then, the chime for the start of class rang.
Of course, Jack was nowhere to be found in the classroom.

name: Snegurochka
text:
（I... Did I get tricked!?
Brother Jack, you dummy, dummy, dummy~!!）

The next day--
Snegurochka was alone, outside the city.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehehe, don't underestimate my Santa "sneaking" ability, alright?
Brother's "delinquency", I'm going to put a stop to it!

name: Snegurochka
text:
…Even so, this far out...
I wonder where he's heading?

It was near Oji in Kita Ward, Tokyo.
It was the 'base' of a certain 'game' player.

name: Snegurochka
text:
…Huh?
I spaced out for a moment and Brother's already gone!? T-there's no way!

Even after looking around for a while,
Jack seemed to have already gone somewhere.

As Snegurochka instinctively slumped to the ground,
a gentle voice called out to her.

name: Korpokkur
text:
What's wrong, Snegurochka?
If you sit there, your beautiful "clothes" will get dirty, you know?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wah, you startled me!
Um, since you know me, are you a fan...?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Well, something like that.
You seemed to be in trouble.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Actually, I was chasing someone,
but I lost sight of them around here...

name: Korpokkur
text:
Oh, I saw you, you were chasing Jack, right?
I know where he is, so shall I guide you?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Eh, no way,
you know Brother Jack too!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Well, I suppose so.
I'm pretty good at remembering things.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Um, if you could.
I want to bring Brother Jack back to school!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Alright, actually, I've heard about you from Jack.
I thought it was about time.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack talked about me...!?
Ehehe, what did he say?

name: Korpokkur
text:
He said you were "loud", annoyingly persistent,
and a complete nuisance.

Korpokkur chuckled amusingly at Snegurochka,
who puffed out her cheeks at the harsh description.

name: Korpokkur
text:
…But he doesn't dislike you.
He "said", 'If I had a little sister, she'd probably be like this'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack said that!?
Ehehe, he's so dishonest~.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Look, while we were talking, we arrived.
This is the children's paradise, you know.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Now, I'd like a quick check. About Jack, he doesn't want other
people to know about this, so do you still want to know?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Eh, um...
Is Brother Jack really here...?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Yes.
You can still turn back now, you know?

Unexpectedly led to this place,
"it" appeared before a bewildered Snegurochka.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Greetings! My name is Frosty!
Welcome to the Magical Snowland of snow and fluff... huh?

name: Snegurochka
text: B... Brother Jack...!?

And so, the gears of the world began to turn slightly.
Like to be drawn in, even in this loop--

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, "Moritaka".
Shall we have hotpot today?

Looking at the hotpot vegetable set,
Yoshito spoke to the Moritaka doll he was holding.

That person is one of the Eight Dog Warriors, Inukawa Sousuke Yoshito.
He yearns for his childhood friend Moritaka, and "targets" him--

A person who laments that, despite possessing the
bead of 'Righteousness' as one of the Eight Dog Warriors,
he is defiled and has strayed from the human path.

name: Waiter
text:
Oh, are you shopping with Moritaka-kun again today?
Since we are really close, if it's for hotpot, I'll give you a discount, alright?

name: Yoshito
text:
Oh, no, I'm sorry.
Please don't bother.

name: Waiter
text:
It's fine, it's fine! It's my thanks for your "patronage".
And here, this is a lottery ticket from the shopping street.

name: Yoshito
text:
Thank you, I'll go if I feel like it.
My usual behavior isn't very good, so...

name: Waiter
text:
What are you talking about? If you don't try,
you won't win anything, will you?

name: Waiter
text:
Well then, you two stay good friends!
Please come again!

Yoshito waved his hand modestly and left the shop.
Across the street, people were gathered around a lottery stall.

Clutching the lottery ticket that he would usually throw in the trash,
he slowly joined the line. And then--

name: Waiter
text:
Oh~ oh~ we~ have~ a~ winner~!!
You're lucky, here's the second prize, a ticket-for-two to the amusement park!

name: Yoshito
text:
No way, I actually won something...
W-what should I do...?

This is the Beastman Dorm of Kagano Academy,
a dorm for Beasts who cannot control their rampages
and the Tamers who control them belong.

In one of its rooms, Hastur, the Old One from another world,
was surprised by a message he received.

name: Hastur
text:
I... I won...!?
I applied on a whim, but I never thought I'd actually win.

Clutched in Hastur's hand was a pair invitation ticket
to an amusement park called Magical Snowland.

name: Hastur
text:
However, with a ticket-for-two, who should I invite?
Is such a difficult task even possible for me...?
A candidate came to his mind, but Hastur shook his head from side to side to ward off the impure thought.

name: Hastur
text:
Why did that person's face come to mind first just now!?
Impossible, that alone is impossible...!

Indeed, Hastur currently had a master in Tokyo,
but he didn't want to acknowledge it.

name: Hastur
text:
If that's the case, I'll go alone... but
no, that's also too difficult!

name: Hastur
text:
At the very least, my dormmates must not know,
because it's very much not my character to go to an amusement park!

name: Hastur
text:
With no other choice, I shall embark on a journey to
find a suitable companion to accompany me to the amusement park.

name: Hastur
text:
W-whoa!?
W-what are you guys doing here!?

Waiting for Hastur as he left his room
were the members of the same guild, Beast Tamers.

name: Alp
text:
Hastur, where are you going?
Why don't the two of us go out alone for once~?

name: Fenrir
text:
It just so happens that I, too, was "bored",
if you are heading somewhere, I don't mind accompanying you!

name: Pazuzu
text:
Dear my cute little lizard.
If you don't have the courage to invite, this Pazuzu-san will go with you~!

name: Yuma
text:
Hmm, Hastur, just hid something.
With everyone, I want to come too!

name: Cu Sith
text:
Sniff, sniff, sniff, over there--!
You're hiding something in your clothes--!

name: Hastur
text:
Stop it, Cu Sith!
You shouldn't "sniff" such places!?

Hastur, resigned, presented the amusement park ticket-for-two
to Cu Sith and the others.

name: Hastur
text:
You "fools"!
What insolence, eavesdropping on me!?

name: Yuma
text:
Hastur, looked very happy.
I'm curious, is that weird?

name: Hastur
text:
D... Don't you talk such nonsense.
Who would be excited about a mere amusement park!?

name: Cu Sith
text:
Eh~ everyone, look!
This ticket is only for two people?

At Cu Sith's remark of 'only for two people',
tension ran through everyone.

name: Alp
text:
Don't worry, Hastur!
I'll go with you and teach you how to enjoy an amusement park, okay?

name: Fenrir
text:
Hmph, Alp, you don't understand, do you?
We do not flock, we are solitary beings.

name: Fenrir
text:
I shall teach you what it means to go to an amusement park alone.
The darkness that wells up within me shall, along with you, form a solitary star!

name: Pazuzu
text:
Ehh~, little lizard, you'll choose me, right?
Because it's safer with this Pazuzu-san with you, right?

name: Yuma
text:
I... the amusement park, I want to go.
Being alone, scary... so, Hastur?

name: Hastur
text:
Ugh, Yuma.
Don't look at me with those human eyes of yours!?

Hastur sighed at Alp and the others, who began arguing
over who would get to go to the amusement park with the remaining spot.

Then he flapped the two tickets and muttered,
just before returning to his room.

name: Hastur
text:
I'll give them to you. It's not like... I was that enthusiastic about it anyway.
There are only two spots left, so you all can discuss and decide.

As the door slammed shut, Alp and the others
looked at each other.

That night, after finishing his work with the Biological Disaster Countermeasures Unit,
Pazuzu caught Hastur, who was about to return to his room, and called out to him.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Little lizard, here.
Everyone here says sorry to you.

What Pazuzu handed him was the ticket-for-two to the amusement park.
Hastur stared at it and snorted.

name: Hastur
text:
Even though I kindly gave them to them.
To disregard it so callously, what foolish people.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Those kids noticed you were having trouble inviting someone.
Well, of course, they probably wanted to go to the amusement park too, but...

name: Pazuzu
text:
We thought we might have meddled a bit too much,
and everyone's reflecting on it for now.

name: Pazuzu
text:
It's fine to go alone, or if you have someone you want to invite, then invite them.
Of course, if you're ever at a loss for who to invite, you can always ask us.

name: Pazuzu
text:
From this Pazuzu-san's perspective, I'd like you to
try to expand your interactions with someone other than us.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, how intrusive of you.
But fine, I'll take it to my own hands.

Watching Pazuzu lightly raise his hand and leave,
Hastur thought of one particular person.

name: Hastur
text:
U-um, this... in case something goes wrong, you just chose someone
that wouldn't be a problem if they lost their life.

name: Hastur
text:
It's not like you wanted to choose them,
it just so happened that they were conveniently available...

In front of Hastur, who was muttering to himself like casting a spell,
was the target person, [Player].

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, hey, isn't this good?
Look, I already have the tickets too!

Tianzun, a self-proclaimed slightly bad old man and a delinquent teacher from Asakusa,
was hitting on [Player], the transfer student.

name: Tianzun
text:
Won't you come with me to Magical Snowland?
I'm sure it'll be super fun!

options.text: Teacher, that sounds fun, so absolutely!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not sudden, is it?
I love happy things, so it's not that strange.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: The students were talking about the amusement park and seemed to be having fun, and it seems there's going to be a parade too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There's no choice but to go, right?
Isn't it good? I want to go to the amusement park with you!

options.text: Why don't you give it to Quantum or someone else?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
How could you say something so lonely~!
Don't worry, I've already given some to Quantum and the others!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's better for them friends to go and have fun together than for me to join, right?
That's why I came to invite you!

name: Yoshito
text:
Wait just a second! My master is going to "paradise" (Snowland)
with Moritaka, and my childhood friend's happiness is my wish!!

In this world, Yoshito, a young assassin who looks up to [Player]
as his master and handles dirty work for them, retorted.

name: Yoshito
text:
Therefore, Master, please accept my ticket-for-two.
I'm fine, I'll watch from the shadows.

name: Yoshito
text:
However, when you two are united, well,
I wish I could be a stain on the wall and stay by your side.

options.text: I have no idea what just happened from beginning to end.
Yoshito, you should go with Moritaka instead.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What...! No! I just want Moritaka to be happy.
For that, it's better if Master goes with him than me...

options.text: Yoshito, you don't want to go with me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What...! Master, that way of speaking is unfair.
Do you really want to go to the amusement park with someone like me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, that's not something a loyal doll should ask.
If it's an order, I will obey no matter how cruel.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What is it, young man? You're reeking of negative aura, aren't you?
It's no good, young one, happiness won't come if you don't wish for it.

text: Hastur, who was watching from the sidelines, sighed like he couldn't understand.

name: Hastur
text:
Honestly, even though I came to call out to them.
What's the deal with [Player]?

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, but I can just go with my dormmates, can't I?
Maybe I'll even invite Pazuzu sometimes...

name: Hastur
text:
No, I can't do that.
I might make that outwardly good pervert misunderstand.
Meanwhile, the quarrel over [Player] was taking place in his line of sight.

name: Tianzun
text:
[Player], you are coming with me, right?
Why don't you guys come too, it's more fun with a crowd!

name: Yoshito
text:
No, thank you. It's not about having fun.
It's for Moritaka and Master to deepen their bond. Isn't that right, Master?

name: Tianzun
text:
I too!
To deepen our bond even more and do this and that... Hehehehe.

options.text: Both are hard to give up...!
Who I want to go with is...

text:
At that moment, you noticed Hastur, who was a little further away,
and realized that your eyes met.

Hastur, perhaps sensing that [Player] was in trouble,
came over and interrupted the conversation.

name: Hastur
text:
Wait, you lot, [Player] is going to the amusement park with me!
Using this ticket, that is!?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hoh, another rival has appeared.
It's very popular, especially with it being the Christmas season, isn't it?

name: Yoshito
text:
As expected, Master, your talent as a lord who fascinates so many,
I, as your servant, am truly delighted.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, I don't know who you lot are, but you won't be able to handle this one.
It's better for you to flee before you awaken a sleeping madness, isn't it?

options.text: We're just going to the amusement park, right...?
Alright, let's just all go together!

text:
Ignoring [Player], the three started making a ruckus.
The tickets they each clutched fluttered uneasily.
